terraform import module.vm_1.google_compute_instance.vm_template some_propject/some_zone/vm-1
terraform import module.vm_2.google_compute_instance.vm_template some_propject/some_zone/vm-2
terraform import google_compute_instance.vm_3 some_propject/some_zone/vm-3
